hackathon-description-text: We are excited to introduce Boston College's first full-scale hackathon! Hack the Heights will feature corporate sponsors, tech talks, and prizes for beginners and seasoned hackers alike.
hackathon-rules: Teams are limited to 4 members max

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo Dots for each team member
Raspberry Pi Kit + $50 Amazon Gift Card

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack for the Social Good (GE Prize)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $50 GoPuff Vouchers for each team member

hackathon-description-header: Build something awesome in 24 hours or less!
